title: Gold 2 looking for team
body:
Gold 2 looking for team, i main mid but leanring adc at the moment. Experience in Gold 1 and plat 4 ranked 5's teams. Looking for a team that played everyday/ ever few days a week. IGN: Axcus 

Keen to have a chat if ur looking for someone then feel free to add me :)

replies.body: Im also looking for a team, mains jungler suport really good. minimum gold plis. My name is "cordellat" i play everyday, add me :)
